snippet: The new policy is intended to avoid the appearance that the administration is being consumed by the campaign as officials walk a fine political, and sometimes legal, line....
abstract: Denis McDonough, Pres Obama's chief of staff, announces prohibition against members of Pres Obama's cabinet addressing Democratic National Convention; says move was needed in order to clearly separate it from Hillary Clinton's presidential campaign.
lead_paragraph: The new policy is intended to avoid the appearance that the administration is being consumed by the campaign as officials walk a fine political, and sometimes legal, line.

headline.main: White House Prohibits Cabinet From Addressing Democratic Convention
headline.print_headline: White House Prohibits Cabinet From Addressing Democratic Convention
